message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product that I think you'll really love. I'm looking for $10000 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do a bit better than $8000, but I'm not willing to go as low as that. How about we meet at $9000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $9000. How about we meet at $8500? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
I can see you're serious about the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $9250?
I'm getting close to your price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $9250. I'm willing to go up to $8750. Can you meet me there?
